sentences.en: Divergent opinions about proposed legislation are frequently seen within the environmentalist community.
sentences.cn: 关于立法建议的分歧意见也时常会在环保主义者的内部出现.

sentences.en: Environmentalist at Hanoi University of Sciences Professor Co says using LPG is a viable fuel option.
sentences.cn: 汉诺大学的环境专家表示,使用液化石油气是可行的燃料选择.

sentences.en: I had no idea you were such environmentalist before!
sentences.cn: 我以前还真不知道你是个环保主义者.

sentences.en: It did not just inspire the vegetarian in me but also the environmentalist and humanitarian.
sentences.cn: 它不仅影响我成为一位素食者,并且让我成为一位环境保护论者与人道主义者.

sentences.en: My conclusion is that a well - meaning environmentalist will make counterproductive decisions several times a day.
sentences.cn: 我的结论是:好心的环保主义者每天会做出很多事与愿违的决定.

sentences.en: The environmentalist launched out at great length on energy preservation.
sentences.cn: 这位环境保护论者就节约能源问题发了一通议论.

sentences.en: This breed of environmentalist opposes everything.
sentences.cn: 这帮环境保护论者反对一切.
